summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Accounting/Finance Control Module (Phase 1). Backend: 16/16 tests passed after fixing MongoDB ObjectId serialization bug in close-day endpoint. Frontend: Fixed critical React error in Add Entry dialog (empty SelectItem value). All features working correctly.

fixed.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error - _id not excluded from response
React error: SelectItem with empty value in Project dropdown

passed_tests: POST /api/accounting/transactions - creates transaction and updates balance
GET /api/accounting/daily-summary/{date} - returns daily summary with account balances
POST /api/accounting/transactions - rejects transactions on locked day
GET /api/accounting/projects-list - returns projects for expense linking
Account balance cards display correctly (Petty Cash, Bank of Baroda, etc.)
Day Summary card shows correct totals
Transaction table displays all columns (Time, Type, Amount, Account, Category, Project, Paid To, Remarks, Verified)
Add Entry dialog form fields work correctly
Transaction creation via UI works and updates balance
Close Day button appears when transactions exist
Empty state shows 'No transactions for this day'
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py - Fixed MongoDB _id serialization in close-day endpoint
/app/frontend/src/pages/CashBook.jsx - Fixed empty SelectItem value in Project dropdown
seed_data_creation: Test transactions created during testing (prefixed with TEST_)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Accounting module fully tested. Two bugs were found and fixed: 1) Backend close-day endpoint had MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue, 2) Frontend Add Entry dialog had React error due to empty SelectItem value. All CRUD operations for accounts, categories, and transactions work correctly. Daily closing/locking feature works. Permission-based access control is in place.
